def rad_ladies(name):
    return "".join(c for c in name if c.isalpha() or c.isspace() or c == "!").upper()

def rad_ladies(name):
    return ''.join(i.upper() for i in name if not i.isdigit() and i not in '%$&/£?@')

def rad_ladies(text):
    return ''.join(c for c in text if c.isalpha() or c in " !").upper()

def rad_ladies(name):
    return ''.join(i.upper()for i in name if i.isalpha() or i==' ' or i=='!')

def rad_ladies(name):
    return "".join(char for char in name.upper() if char.isalpha() or char in " !")
